headline: White Bean Dip
name: White Bean Dip
description: An awesome alternative to the usual refried beans and tortilla chips. Serve this dip with pita chips or veggie wheat crackers.
recipeIngredient: 2 (15 ounce) cans cannellini beans, rinsed and drained
3 cloves garlic, crushed or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a food processor, combine the cannellini beans, cilantro, garlic, olive oil and lemon juice. Process until smooth, or to your desired consistency. Taste, and season with salt and pepper.
